Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.string

Class Strings

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.string.Strings
public class Strings extends Object
General purpose utilities for Java strings.

Equality

  • equalsAllowNull(String, String)
  • equalIgnoringCase(String, String)

    • replaceAll

      public static String replaceAll(String s, String searchFor, String replaceWith)
      Replace all occurrences of one string replaceWith another string. Note that this does not require the compilation of a regular expression and is faster.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to process
      searchFor - The value to search for
      replaceWith - The value to searchFor replaceWith
      Returns:
      The resulting string with searchFor replaced with replaceWith
